Keyboard shortcuts for Proto.io

A visual cheat-sheet for the 48 keyboard shortcuts found in Proto.io

Original Reference Report Issue

Main

Find

  • Ctrl
  • F

Show keyboard shortcuts

  • Ctrl
  • K

Save

  • Ctrl
  • S

Close modal windows

  • Esc

Preview

  • Shift
  • P

Save and Preview

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • S

History

Undo

  • Ctrl
  • Z

Redo

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • Z

Go to previous canvas

  • Ctrl
  • [

Go to next canvas

  • Ctrl
  • ]

Edit

Select all

  • Ctrl
  • A

Cut

  • Ctrl
  • X

Copy

  • Ctrl
  • C

Paste

  • Ctrl
  • V

Duplicate

  • Ctrl
  • D

Delete

  • Backspace

Grid

Toggle grid

  • Ctrl
  • '

Toggle grid system

  • Ctrl
  • \

Toggle custom guides

  • Ctrl
  • ;

Toggle smart guides

  • Ctrl
  • L

Toggle snap to grid on drag or resize

  • Alt

View

Zoom in

  • Ctrl
  • +

Zoom out

  • Ctrl
  • -

Zoom to 100%

  • Ctrl
  • 0

Fit to screen

  • Ctrl
  • 1

Zoom to selected layers, or fit all layers if none selected

  • Ctrl
  • 2

Center selected layer(s) in the canvas, or center on screen if none selected

  • Ctrl
  • 3

Toggle right pane

  • Ctrl
  • Right

Toggle left pane

  • Ctrl
  • Left

Pan canvas while keydown

  • Space

Item

Bring to front

  • Ctrl
  • Up

  • Ctrl
  • Down

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • Up

Send backwards

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • Down

  • (arrows)

Snap item

  • Shift
  • (arrows)

Lock drag direction (hold while dragging)

  • Shift

Insert rectangle

  • R

Insert oval

  • O

Insert line

  • L

Insert text

  • T

Insert interaction area

  • I

Enter selected container

  • Enter

Group selected

  • Ctrl
  • G

Ungroup selected

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • G
